Package client.Controllers

Class PostItemController

java.lang.Object
client.Controllers.PostItemController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemController
public class PostItemController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemController
this class sets the information for each cell of the posts' list.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane init()
      this method sets the post's information
      Specified by:
      init in interface ItemController

    • like

      public void like​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      when the user hits the like button this method is called and then if the like button was not selected then it is a like. otherwise the command sent to the server would be disliking this post.

    • comment

      public void comment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      this method is used for loading the comment section
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • rePost

      public void rePost​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      this method is used for reposting.

      if the user has already reposted the post then it will be not possible to repost again; otherwise when the user hits the repost button one repost is added to his / her list of posts.

    • loadUserPage

      public void loadUserPage​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      this method is called when the user hits the post's publisher it sends the username to the server and receives an updated user. then it loads the profile page of the received user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
